duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain business requirements, documentation, and process flows within a health insurance company.
Work closely with executive-level audience to gather and define project requirements.
Utilize SDLC, Agile, and Scrum methodologies to create and manage project requirements.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to facilitate communication and document business processes.
Ensure traceability of requirements and artifacts throughout the project lifecycle.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Business Analysis, or a related field (Master's preferred)
